foreignData.name: Goblin-Pöbeltreiber
foreignData.text:
Andere Goblin-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, greifen in jedem Kampf an, falls möglich.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes in deinem Zug erzeugst du einen 1/1 roten Goblin-Kreaturenspielstein mit Eile.
Immer wenn der Goblin-Pöbeltreiber angreift, erhält er für jeden anderen angreifenden Goblin +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Agitador trasgo
foreignData.text:
Las otras criaturas Trasgo que controlas atacan cada combate si pueden.
Al comienzo del combate en tu turno, crea una ficha de criatura Trasgo roja 1/1 con la habilidad de prisa.
Siempre que el Agitador trasgo ataque, obtiene +1/+0 hasta el final del turno por cada otro Trasgo atacante.

foreignData.name: Maître plébéien gobelin
foreignData.text:
Les autres créatures Gobelin que vous contrôlez attaquent à chaque combat si possible.
Au début du combat pendant votre tour, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Gobelin avec la célérité.
À chaque fois que le Maître plébéien gobelin attaque, il gagne +1/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour pour chaque autre gobelin attaquant.

foreignData.name: Goblin Trascinatore di Folle
foreignData.text:
Le altre creature Goblin che controlli attaccano in ogni combattimento, se possono farlo.
All'inizio del combattimento nel tuo turno, crea una pedina creatura Goblin 1/1 rossa con rapidità.
Ogniqualvolta il Goblin Trascinatore di Folle attacca, prende +1/+0 fino alla fine del turno per ogni altro Goblin che attacca.

foreignData.name: ゴブリンの熟練扇動者
foreignData.text:
各戦闘で、あなたがコントロールしていてこれでないすべてのゴブリン・クリーチャーは可能なら攻撃する。
あなたのターンの戦闘の開始時に、速攻を持つ赤の１/１のゴブリン・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
ゴブリンの熟練扇動者が攻撃するたび、ターン終了時まで、これは攻撃していてこれでないゴブリン１体につき＋１/＋０の修整を受ける。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・戦士

mainBoard.name: Goblin Rabblemaster
mainBoard.originalText:
Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

rulings.text: Although Goblin Rabblemaster doesn't force itself to attack, if you control two of them, they'll force each other to attack if able.

If, during your declare attackers step, a creature that must attack if able is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can't attack, or hasn't been under your control continuously since the turn began (and doesn't have haste), then it doesn't attack. If there's a cost associated with having a creature attack, you're not forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to attack in that case either.
The number of attacking Goblins is counted as the last ability resolves, and the bonus is locked in at that time.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: General Kreat, the Boltbringer
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever one or more Goblins you control attack, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Whenever another creature you control enters, General Kreat, the Boltbringer deals 1 damage to each opponent.

rulings.text: Although the token created by General Kreat's first ability enters attacking, it was never declared as an attacker. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won't trigger. If there are any costs to have a creature attack, those costs won't apply to the token.
If General Kreat enters at the same time as one or more other creatures you control, its last ability will trigger for each of those creatures.
You choose which player, planeswalker, or battle the token is attacking. It doesn't need to be the same player, planeswalker, or battle that any of the other Goblins are attacking.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever one or more Goblins you control attack, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Whenever another creature you control enters, General Kreat deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Whenever Battle Cry Goblin attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: Battle Cry Goblin's activated ability will affect only Goblins you control as it resolves. If you activate it before attacking and then create a Goblin with its triggered ability during combat, the Goblin you create will not get +1/+0.

――常智のリエール
foreignData.name: 火の予言
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。火の予言はそれに３点のダメージを与える。あなたの手札にあるカード１枚をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。そうしたなら、カード１枚を引く。

mainBoard.name: Fire Prophecy
mainBoard.originalText: Fire Prophecy deals 3 damage to target creature. You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Fire Prophecy tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. You won't have the option to put a card on the bottom of your library.
While resolving Fire Prophecy, you can't put more than one card on the bottom of your library to draw more than one card.

mainBoard.text: Fire Prophecy deals 3 damage to target creature. You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: He might call up a burst of lava or a raging hellion from Akoum's volcanic depths. Or he might just fall in.

foreignData.flavorText: Er könnte einen Lavaausbruch oder einen wütenden Teufelsbraten aus den vulkanischen Tiefen Akoums heraufbeschwören. Oder er könnte einfach hineinfallen.
foreignData.name: Erdspaltenzauberer
foreignData.text: Wenn der Erdspaltenzauberer ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Karte abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Puede invocar un estallido de lava o un infernal iracundo de las profundidades volcánicas de Akoum. O puede que se caiga dentro de la fisura.
foreignData.name: Hechicero de fisuras
foreignData.text: Cuando el Hechicero de fisuras entre, puedes descartar una carta. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Il pourrait invoquer une explosion de lave ou une monstruosité enragée des profondeurs d'Akoum. Ou bien il pourrait simplement tomber.
foreignData.name: Sorcier de la fissure
foreignData.text: Quand le Sorcier de la fissure arrive, vous pouvez vous défausser d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Potrebbe evocare un'esplosione di lava o un infernale furioso dalle profondità vulcaniche di Akoum. Oppure potrebbe caderci.
foreignData.name: Mago delle Fratture
foreignData.text: Quando il Mago delle Fratture entra, puoi scartare una carta. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 奴はアクームの火山の底から溶岩の噴流や怒れるヘリオンを呼び出すかもしれない。あるいは、ただ落っこちてしまうだけの可能性もある。
foreignData.name: 地割れの魔術師
foreignData.text: 地割れの魔術師が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を捨ててもよい。そうしたなら、カード１枚を引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・ウィザード

mainBoard.name: Fissure Wizard
mainBoard.originalText: When Fissure Wizard enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: While resolving Fissure Wizard's ability, you can't discard more than one card.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever."
—Razzix, sparkmage

foreignData.flavorText:
„Das Schöne daran ist, dass sie ihn nie kommen sehen. Niemals."
—Razzix, Funkenmagier
foreignData.name: Schock
foreignData.text: Der Schock fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Lo hermoso que tiene es que nunca lo ven venir. Nunca".
—Rázzix, magochispa
foreignData.name: Choque
foreignData.text: El Choque hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Le plus beau, c'est qu'ils ne le voient jamais venir. Jamais. »
—Razzix, étincemage
foreignData.name: Choc
foreignData.text: Le Choc inflige 2 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La cosa bella è che non se lo aspettano. Mai."
—Razzix, magoscintilla
foreignData.name: Shock
foreignData.text: Lo Shock infligge 2 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「その美しさは、それが飛んでくるのが見えないってことだな。絶対に。」
――火花魔道士、ラジックス
foreignData.name: ショック
foreignData.text: １つを対象とする。ショックはそれに２点のダメージを与える。

mainBoard.name: Shock
mainBoard.originalText: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
